name: Sleigh Smash
description:
Play as Santa's two favorite reindeer, [Redacted] and [Unnamed], and collect presents to give to homes before Christmas! Be careful not to smash Santa's sleigh while you're flying around!

How to Play -

WASD - Left Reindeer

Arrows - Right Reindeer

R - Restart Level

Avoid moving the sleigh too fast into obstacles, or it'll take damage! If the sleigh takes too much damage, Game Over!

Made for the Advent of Games Jam 2022

Made with Gamemaker

Sounds made with SFXR

Sound used from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/EminYILDIRIM/sounds/536085/
